18g PROTEIN
Candy Bar Copycat

CANDY BAR COPYCAT: PROTEIN BUTTERFINGER

A crunchy, peanut buttery Butterfinger copycat with a healthy twist and 18g of protein.

18g
Protein
270
Calories
25m
Total Time
12
Yield

Nutrition per 1 bar

Carbs24g
Fat16g
Fiber4g
Sugar13g
DifficultyMedium

INGREDIENTS

  • 120g peanut butter
  • 80g honey
  • 60g vanilla whey protein powder
  • 90g cornflakes, crushed
  • 150g dark chocolate chips

INSTRUCTIONS

1

Make the filling

In a saucepan, heat the peanut butter and honey over low heat until melted and smooth. Remove from heat and stir in the protein powder and crushed cornflakes.

2

Press into pan

Press the mixture into a lined loaf pan.

3

Chill

Refrigerate for 30 minutes to set.

4

Melt chocolate

Melt the dark chocolate chips in the microwave.

5

Cut and coat

Cut the chilled mixture into bars and dip each bar in the melted chocolate.

6

Set and serve

Place on a parchment-lined plate and refrigerate until the chocolate is set.

PRO TIPS

üí°

Store in an airtight container at room temperature for up to 5 days.

üí°

For best results, use a kitchen scale to measure ingredients in grams.

üí°

Let cool completely before storing to prevent sogginess.
